explanation: [0-0] A man in a sailor suit stands in a room, holding a headphone and making exaggerated expressions in front of a microphone, with two lines of letters appearing at the top of the screen.

[0-4] Then the man in the sailor suit puts on the headphones, sings a line, covers his throat, and waves his hand. The scene switches to an outdoor setting, where a man in blue clothes sits in front of a table with headphones on and a white laptop in front of him. The letters at the top of the screen also change.
